```{r test, eval=FALSE}
library(gpuRandom)
library(gpuR)


Nstreams = 4
streamsR<-vclMatrix(0L, nrow=Nstreams, ncol=18, type="integer")
gpuRandom:::CreateStreamsGpuBackend(streamsR)

t(as.matrix(streamsR))


Nglobal = 4
streams = gpuRandom::CreateStreams(Nglobal);
t(streams)
```
